bioDescription:
I am a dedicated Software Engineer with expertise in building efficient and scalable web applications. Currently contributing to the fintech domain at Valuefy Solutions, I specialize in Angular, Node.js, Loopback, and MySQL, developing user-centric features and streamlining critical workflows.

With a strong focus on performance optimization and code quality, I have a proven track record of enhancing back-end processes, improving overall system performance, and ensuring seamless application functionality. My approach combines technical expertise with a commitment to delivering impactful, high-quality solutions tailored to business needs.

educatinoDegrees.summary: Specialized in Software Development, Data Structures, Algorithms, and Database Management during my B.Tech in Computer Science, with a strong foundation in solving complex technical challenges
Graduated with a Diploma in Computer Engineering from Andhra Polytechnic College, building a strong foundation in programming and mastering core concepts of Computer Science and Engineering

achievements: Developed innovative features for a fintech platform, improving user experience and business performance.
Optimized backend processes with Node.js, Loopback, and MySQL, enhancing system efficiency and performance.
Streamlined critical workflows, reducing production issues and boosting operational efficiency across teams.
Collaborated in a cross-functional team, delivering high-quality code and ensuring seamless system integration.
